Column.name: Template
Template
Template
Column.value:
$COMMENT="Convert SQL type to JAVA type" $COMMENT="Convert the SQL type of Postgres to the corresponding JAVA type"
$varType = $parameter1
%if $varType == ""% $ParamType = "int" %elseIf $varType == "bigint"% $ParamType = "long" %elseIf $varType == "varchar"% $ParamType = "String" %elseIf $varType == "decimal"% $ParamType = "double" %elseIf $varType == "double precisition"% $ParamType = "double" %elseIf $varType == "integer"% $ParamType = "int" %else% $ParamType = $varType %endIf% $ParamType

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
Interface { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("Class")% %TRANSFORM_CURRENT("language")% name=%qt%%className%Repository%qt% language="Java" Parent { name=%qt%CrudRepository<%className%, String>%qt% type="Implements" } Tag { name="dataClassname" value=%qt%%className%%qt% } Tag { name="dataElemtype" value=%qt%%elemType%%qt% } %list="ClassParameter" @separator="
" @indent=" "% %list="ClassBase" @separator="
" @indent=" "% %list="ClassInterface" @separator="
" @indent=" "% %list="InnerClass" @separator="
" @indent=" "% $COMMENT="This causes some trouble" $COMMENT=%if elemType!="Interface"% $COMMENT=%list="Attribute" @separator="
" @indent=" "% $COMMENT=%endIf%
$T=%className% Operation { name="queryByUuidAndHistory" stereotype="query" scope="" type=%qt%List<$T>%qt% Parameter { name="uuid" type="String" } Parameter { name="history" type="String" } code=%qt%%qt% Tag{name="attribute_name" value="uuidAndHistory"} }
%list="Attribute__AsProperties" @separator="
" @indent=" " attScope=="Public"% %list="Operation" @separator="
" @indent=" "% } %list="Connector" @separator="
"%
